sub_title: Global Head of SEO & Content at Tellent
summary: I have 7+ years of experience in SEO and Content Operations, with a track record in driving organic growth that supports revenue generation. I’m passionate about driving projects to achieve business growth, and optimising the online experience for audiences.

awards.title: 1st Prize HSBC/British Council Mandarin Speaking Competition
awards.description:
I won 1st prize in the Years 10 - 11 category at the HSBC/British Council Mandarin Speaking Competition in London in 2008 and won a week-long all-expenses-paid trip to Beijing with other winners from different categories. 

Below are articles written about me in:

• The Star newspaper - http://bit.ly/1CQh77h 
• Ham&High website - http://goo.gl/Kx7AjV

profile_positions.description:
Tellent, a premier Talent Management Suite, enables People teams to improve the full employee lifecycle with a cutting-edge Applicant Tracking System, CoreHR, and Performance Management Software – all in one place.

With 300+ talented employees operating from six global locations, we've empowered over 7,000 organizations across 100+ countries with our leading HR tech solutions – Recruitee, KiwiHR, and Javelo. We have a growing network of over 500 partners, all committed to one vision: guiding all People leaders to create a better world of work.

www.tellent.com
profile_positions.title: Global Head of SEO and Content

profile_positions.description:
In 2022, I focused a lot more on our website related projects, working closely alongside the Web team (including the Growth and SEO teams) and the Marketing Project Manager to strategize/manage/execute website related projects and requests, ensuring it’s optimised/according to SEO and CRO standards. This project is focused the findability, searchability, usability and conversions of the Recruitee website. 

Task associated while working on the website:
- Stakeholder management
- Project management
- Problem solving
- SEO audits and optimisations
- Copy and design checks

Team management
- Managed 2 SEO specialists
- Oversaw the completion of team goals, including a few SEO and/or cross-functional projects
- Conducted catch-ups, annual reviews, and weekly meetings
- Worked with and coached my team to improve individual performance
- Interviewed, hired and organised onboarding processes for my new hire

Collaboration with other teams
- Worked closely with the Marketing team leads toward Marketing goals
- Worked closely with the Web team and the Marketing Project Manager on the website project
- Conducted collaborative hiring with other Marketing team leads and colleagues for expansion of the team
- Conducted a workshop for our customer facing teams on how clients can optimise their careers site to get more candidates with Recruitee’s careers site analytics
profile_positions.title: Head of SEO

profile_positions.description:
In addition to the tasks listed for the role below, I also worked on the following in 2021:

Blog migration
- Managed the blog migration project; collaborated closely with our Website Designer, Content team, DevOps, and external agencies on setting up new blog structure, design elements and the actual migration

Website redesign and migration
- Collaborated closely with the Growth team on A/B testing new messaging
- Collaborated closely with the Product Marketing, Content, Growth and Creative teams on the new website structure and design, ensuring it’s optimised for SEO
- Managed all SEO related tasks for the migration such as preparing and checking redirects, fixing tech issues, optimising SEO elements (metas, internal links, etc.), etc

Result: +271% in organic traffic between Dec 2021 - Dec 2022 (1 year post migration stats).

DACH resource library
- Researched and created briefs for job description templates and checklists for our German resource hub and worked alongside the DACH content team on this project

Collaboration with other teams
- Conducted a workshop for our customer facing teams on how to optimise your careers site for SEO
- Interviewed our customer facing teams to get a better understanding of our prospects and customers and used those insights for the global SEO strategy
- Worked closely with the Marketing team leads toward Marketing goals

(Team) management
- Managed 1 SEO Specialist and a few content/SEO/link building freelancers
- Oversaw the completion of team goals, including a few SEO and/or cross-functional projects
- Conducted catch-ups to discuss progress, annual reviews, and weekly meetings
- Worked with and coached my team to improve individual performance
- Interviewed, hired and organised onboarding processes for my new hire
- Conducted collaborative hiring with other Marketing team leads and colleagues for expansion of the team

Average YoY improvement in organic traffic for the main website & blog -
US+CAN: 40%
FR: 125%
DACH: 122%
profile_positions.title: SEO Manager

profile_positions.description:
At Recruitee, I’m responsible for the global SEO strategy for the US+CAN, DACH, and FR regions, identifying short and long-term opportunities for organic growth and growing our organic channels to improve pipeline and revenue. In my first year, I focused mostly on growing our EN, DE and FR blogs organically.

- Set up the SEO infrastructure; tools, processes, workflow & reporting
- Set up and execute the SEO roadmap to reach growth goals
- Built a content strategy to improve organic traffic
- Conducted SEO content audits and competitor analysis
- Conducted international keyword research and created detailed article briefs based on buyer personas and search intent for freelancers
- Built a content optimisation strategy to achieve higher rankings and search coverage
- Optimised/edited blog articles
- Managed link-building partnerships
- Fixed tech SEO issues
- Collaborated closely with the Growth, Product Marketing and Content teams on various cross-functional projects
- Collaborated closely with the Content team,  external agencies, and freelancers on SEO and content efforts

YoY improvement in organic traffic for the main website & blog -
EN blog: 69%
DE blog: 292%
FR blog: 189%
Main website overall: 65%
profile_positions.title: SEO Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Content & SEO
- Drove activities aimed at increasing monetisation such as executing content strategies and web and sales analysis using tools such as affiliate networks, Google Search Console and Ahrefs
- Monitored and analysed daily, weekly and monthly SEO and revenue performance using various tools such as GSG’s in-house CMS, Google Analytics, Tableau and Serpbook and used data to inform future strategies
- Adapting our content guidelines to the latest SEO developments
- Improved page content and keyword relevancy to achieve SEO goals
- Oversaw and later led an expansion project between 2018 and May 2020 that brought on 21 additional freelancers and over 700 additional retailers, through competitor and keyword analyses
- Conducted training sessions on SEO and content strategies for new and existing team members

• Team management
- Responsible for a team of 5 content analysts and 23 freelancers (in-house and remote)
- Built the team strategy based on company objectives and oversaw the completion of team OKRs, including several projects
- Conducted monthly OKR catch-ups to discuss progress, annual reviews, weekly meetings and daily stand-ups
- Worked with and coached team members to increase individual performance
- Discussed Individual Growth Plans with each person and using that to help with allocation of projects to the team plus aiding in individual skill building
- Interviewed, hired and organised onboarding processes for new starters
- Collaborated closely with other Content Team Leads within the UK team and company to discuss team and country related topics
profile_positions.title: Content Team Lead - UK at Global Savings Group

profile_positions.description:
• Content & SEO
- Monitored and analysed daily, weekly and monthly SEO and revenue performance
- Optimised retailer landing pages and improved marketing and SEO metrics
- Managed the marketing calendar and developed content such as blogs, promotional materials, social media ads, and marketing newsletters
- Built and managed relationships with high-profile clients and translated marketing needs into result-driven strategies, using Majestic and SimilarWeb as tools

• Team management
- Responsible for a team of 4 content editors and 3 interns
- Set up team strategy and oversaw the completion of tasks and projects
- Conducted weekly meetings and annual reviews, working with team members to increase individual performance
- Interviewed, hired and organised onboarding processes for new starters
- Collaborated closely with other Content Team Leads within the company on team and country related topics
